survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Freelance Platforms
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online freelance platforms to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and preferences for future improvements.

questions.question_text: Which online freelance platform do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment responses by platform. Ensure 'Other' includes a text input field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

script.question_text: Which online freelance platform do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience on your primary freelance platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience on your primary freelance platform?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in a freelance platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This multi-choice question helps identify key features for platform improvement. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in a freelance platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using freelance platforms?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to elaborate on their pain points. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using freelance platforms?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary freelance platform to others?
questions.client_notes: This question measures Net Promoter Score (NPS). Use a 5-point scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary freelance platform to others?
